hero.tagline:
Build as you think.
Talk to your IDE and watch it create.
hero.description: CoderOne IDE is a next‑gen IDE. Free tier has no AI or advanced features. Paid tiers unlock full AI-powered functionality.

talk_to_code.title: Talk‑to‑Code Engine
talk_to_code.description: Describe features in plain English. Paid versions scaffold files, wire modules, and commit clean diffs.

offline_first.title: Offline‑First
offline_first.description: Runs locally. Keep your code private while unlocking AI superpowers.

one_time_license.title: One‑Time License
one_time_license.description: Buy once, keep building. Optional add-ons for teams and enterprises.

star_page.title: ⭐ Rate CoderOne IDE
star_page.subtitle: Help us improve by sharing your thoughts and rating our project!
star_page.rate_question: How would you rate CoderOne IDE?
star_page.feedback_placeholder: Tell us what you think about CoderOne IDE, what features you'd like to see, or any suggestions for improvement...
star_page.github_description: If you like CoderOne IDE, please consider starring our GitHub repository to help others discover our project.

rating_messages.1: 😞 We're sorry to hear that. Your feedback will help us improve!
rating_messages.2: 😐 There's room for improvement. Tell us how we can do better.
rating_messages.3: 🙂 Not bad! We'd love to hear your suggestions.
rating_messages.4: 😊 Great! We're glad you like CoderOne IDE.
rating_messages.5: 🤩 Awesome! Thank you for the amazing rating!

roadmap.title: CoderOne IDE Roadmap
items: Q3 2025: Lite version public launch (AI-assisted coding)
Q4 2025: Team version with collaborative projects
Q1 2026: Full IDE with enterprise integrations
Q2 2026: Offline AI model support and plugin marketplace
Ongoing: Continuous updates and new features based on user feedback

investors.title: Invest in CoderOne IDE
investors.subtitle: Join us in building the ultimate AI-powered IDE.
investors.seed_description: Join our early funding round and help shape the future of AI-powered development.
seed_features: Early access to all product versions
Direct communication with our development team
Quarterly progress reports and exclusive updates
investors.growth_description: Partner with us as we scale and bring AI-powered development to developers worldwide.
investors.visionary_description: Join our vision for the future of software development with significant partnership opportunities.
investors.enterprise_description: Custom enterprise solutions and integration partnerships for large organizations.
